Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Glad to hear that you met Maple. She seems to be settling in well.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Now with more people in the town and your store up and running, we need a proper place for our waste.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Hopefully it isn't too close to your shop.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Even so, if we stay on top of maintaining it, it shouldn't be an issue.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Even so, if we stay on top of maintaining it, it shouldn't be an issue.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Ohh and get this! We are having someone else move in soon.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Raymond is the young gentleman's name. He was actually visiting Maple and really liked the area.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: I imagine he will have his house set up over the next few days, so keep an eye out for him. See you around!
